mapper.select:
select * from nx_distributer_goods
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select * from nx_distributer_father_goods as grand
left join nx_distributer_goods as ndg on ndg.nx_dg_dfg_goods_grand_id = grand.nx_distributer_father_goods_id and ndg.nx_dg_goods_is_hidden = 0 where grand.nx_dfg_fathers_father_id = #{grandId} order by grand.nx_dfg_father_goods_sort, ndg.nx_dg_goods_sort, ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id

select * from nx_distributer_goods as dg left join nx_distributer_standard as ds on ds.nx_DS_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_alias as da on da.nx_DA_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id
left join nx_jrdh_supplier as njs on njs.nx_jrdh_supplier_id = dg.nx_dg_supplier_id left join nx_jrdh_user as sell_user on sell_user.nx_jrdh_user_id = njs.nx_jrdhs_user_id where nx_distributer_goods_id = #{disGoodsId}

select * from nx_distributer_goods as dg left join nx_distributer_standard as ds on ds.nx_DS_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_alias as da on da.nx_DA_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_father_goods as ndfg on ndfg.nx_distributer_father_goods_id = dg.nx_dg_dfg_goods_grand_id where (nx_dg_goods_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_brand like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or da.nx_da_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_pinyin like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_py like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') or da.nx_DA_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') ) and nx_dg_distributer_id = #{disId} and dg.nx_dg_goods_is_hidden = 0 order by dg.nx_dg_goods_sort, dg.nx_dg_goods_sons_sort
select * from nx_distributer_goods where nx_dg_distributer_id = 2

select * from nx_distributer_goods as dg left join nx_distributer_standard as ds on ds.nx_DS_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_alias as da on da.nx_DA_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_father_goods as ndfg on ndfg.nx_distributer_father_goods_id = dg.nx_dg_dfg_goods_father_id where (nx_dg_goods_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_brand like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or da.nx_da_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_pinyin like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_py like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') or da.nx_DA_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') ) and nx_dg_distributer_id = #{disId} and nx_dg_dfg_goods_father_id = #{fatherId} order by dg.nx_dg_goods_sort, dg.nx_dg_goods_sons_sort

select * from nx_distributer_purchase_goods as ndpg left join nx_distributer_goods as dg on ndpg.nx_DPG_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id where (dg.nx_dg_goods_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_brand like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or dg.nx_dg_goods_pinyin like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') or dg.nx_dg_goods_py like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') ) and nx_dg_distributer_id = #{disId} and ndpg.nx_DPG_distributer_id = #{disId} order by dg.nx_dg_goods_sort, dg.nx_dg_goods_sons_sort
select * from nx_distributer_goods as dg left join nx_distributer as dis on dis.nx_distributer_id = dg.nx_dg_distributer_id where dg.nx_dg_nx_goods_id = #{nxGoodsId}

select * from nx_distributer_goods as dg
left join nx_distributer_standard as ds on ds.nx_DS_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_alias as da on da.nx_DA_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_department_orders as dor on dor.nx_DO_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id and dor.nx_DO_status < 3 and dor.nx_DO_department_id = #{depId} left join nx_department_dis_goods as nddg on nddg.nx_DDG_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id and nddg.nx_DDG_department_id = #{depId} left join nx_department_user as du on du.nx_department_user_id = dor.nx_DO_order_user_id where (nx_dg_goods_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_brand like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or da.nx_da_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_dg_goods_pinyin like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') or da.nx_DA_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') ) and nx_dg_distributer_id = #{disId} order by dg.nx_dg_nx_great_grand_id, dg.nx_dg_goods_sort, dg.nx_dg_goods_sons_sort

select * from nx_distributer_goods as ndg left join nx_jrdh_supplier as njs on ndg.nx_dg_supplier_id = njs.nx_jrdh_supplier_id left join nx_jrdh_user as nju on nju.nx_jrdh_user_id= njs.nx_jrdhs_user_id left join nx_distributer_standard as nds on nds.nx_DS_dis_goods_id = ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_father_goods as ndfg on ndfg.nx_distributer_father_goods_id = ndg.nx_dg_dfg_goods_grand_id where ndfg.nx_dfg_fathers_father_id = #{grandId} and ndg.nx_dg_goods_is_hidden = #{isHidden} order by ndfg.nx_dfg_father_goods_sort, ndg.nx_dg_goods_sort, ndg.nx_dg_goods_sons_sort, ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select *, ds.nx_department_id 'nx_department_id', ds.nx_department_name 'nx_department_name', ds.nx_department_attr_name 'nx_department_attr_name', ds.nx_department_type 'nx_department_type', ds.nx_department_father_id 'nx_department_father_id', ds.nx_department_is_group_dep 'nx_department_is_group_dep', df.nx_department_id 'dd_nx_department_id', df.nx_department_name 'dd_nx_department_name', df.nx_department_attr_name 'dd_nx_department_attr_name',
gds.gb_department_name 'gb_department_name', gds.gb_department_attr_name 'gb_department_attr_name', gds.gb_department_type 'gb_department_type', gds.gb_department_father_id 'gb_department_father_id', gds.gb_department_is_group_dep 'gb_department_is_group_dep', gdf.gb_department_id 'dd_gb_department_id', gdf.gb_department_name 'dd_gb_department_name', gdf.gb_department_attr_name 'dd_gb_department_attr_name'
from nx_distributer_goods as ndg left join nx_department_orders as ndo on ndo.nx_DO_dis_goods_id = ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_department as ds on ds.nx_department_id = ndo.nx_DO_department_id left join nx_department df on ds.nx_department_father_id = df.nx_department_id left join gb_department as gds on gds.gb_department_id = ndo.nx_DO_gb_department_id left join gb_department as gdf on gdf.gb_department_id = gds.gb_department_father_id where nx_dg_nx_goods_id is null

select * from nx_distributer_goods as ndg left join nx_jrdh_supplier as njs on ndg.nx_dg_supplier_id = njs.nx_jrdh_supplier_id left join nx_jrdh_user as nju on nju.nx_jrdh_user_id= njs.nx_jrdhs_user_id left join nx_distributer_standard as nds on nds.nx_DS_dis_goods_id = ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id where ndg.nx_dg_dfg_goods_grand_id = #{fatherId} and ndg.nx_dg_goods_is_hidden = #{isHidden} order by ndg.nx_dg_goods_sort, ndg.nx_dg_goods_sons_sort, ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id

select * from nx_distributer_goods as ndg left join nx_distributer_standard as nds on nds.nx_DS_dis_goods_id = ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_father_goods as ndfg on ndfg.nx_distributer_father_goods_id = ndg.nx_dg_dfg_goods_father_id left join nx_department_dis_goods as nddg on nddg.nx_DDG_dis_goods_id = ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id and nddg.nx_DDG_department_id = #{nxDepId} left join nx_department_orders as ndo on ndo.nx_DO_dis_goods_id = ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id and ndo.nx_DO_status < 3 and ndo.nx_DO_department_id = #{nxDepId} where ndfg.nx_dfg_fathers_father_id = #{grandId} and ndg.nx_dg_goods_is_hidden = #{isHidden} order by ndfg.nx_dfg_father_goods_sort, ndg.nx_dg_goods_sort, ndg.nx_dg_goods_sons_sort, ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id

select * from nx_distributer_goods as dg left join nx_distributer_standard as ds on ds.nx_DS_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_alias as da on da.nx_DA_dis_goods_id = dg.nx_distributer_goods_id
left join nx_jrdh_supplier as njs on njs.nx_jrdh_supplier_id = dg.nx_dg_supplier_id left join nx_jrdh_user as sell_user on sell_user.nx_jrdh_user_id = njs.nx_jrdhs_user_id where nx_distributer_goods_id = #{disGoodsId}
